text: Jab yeh log Misr jaa kar Yusuf ki peshi mein dakhil huey to unhon ne arz kiya ke “aey sardar ba iqtedar , hum aur hamare ehal o ayal sakht museebat mein mubtala hain aur hum kuch hakeer si poonji lekar aaye hain, aap humein bharpur galla inayat farmayein aur humko khairaat dein, Allah khairaat karne walon ko jaza deta hai.”
